transcripts.text: Since 1971, Liberty's had one mission, training champions for Christ.  Our standard is excellence with integrity, and our goal is to equip you with the resources and knowledge you need to achieve your goals.  We, the innovators of Liberty University, are committed to using our values, knowledge, and skills to impact tomorrow's technologies.  Our students want more out of an education than just a degree.  They want to live on the cutting edge of innovation.  That's why, at Liberty, you'll go hands-on with new state-of-the-art equipment so you can graduate as a leader in your area of expertise.  In fact, whether you're looking for a degree in electrical, computer, mechanical, civil, or industrial and systems engineering, you'll be part of a school that's committed to making a positive impact on our community, industry, and our world.
